duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive patient care, addressing physical, emotional, and spiritual needs.
Manage a wide range of diagnoses and acute medical conditions in the emergency department.
Maintain nursing ratios based on patient acuity, ensuring high-quality care for all patients.
Participate in the Nurse Residency program for new graduates and mentorship of junior staff.
Adhere to guiding behaviors, promoting a compassionate and transforming healing presence within the community.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Nursing (BSN) or Associate Degree in Nursing (ADN)
BLS Provider certification accredited by the American Heart Association
